thread.title: Air Supply to Perform at Blue Chip November 21
thread.title_full: Air Supply to Perform at Blue Chip November 21

title: Air Supply to Perform at Blue Chip November 21
text:
Written by Blue Chip Casino Hotel & Spa Last Updated on 05 October 2015 
Soft rock duo Air Supply headlines at Blue Chip Casino, Hotel & Spa, Michigan City, Indiana, on Saturday, November 21 at 8 pm in the Stardust Event Center. 
The duo of singer-songwriter and guitarist Graham Russell and lead vocalist Russell Hitchcock formed in 1975 in Australia and in the 1980s had a string of hits worldwide, including eight in the U.S. Chart toppers include “All Out of Love,” “Here I Am,” “The One That I Love,” and “Making Love Out of Nothing at All.” Air Supply continues to perform, with the duo’s latest hit, “I Want You,” currently on the Billboard dance club song charts. 
Tickets start at $35 and go on sale Saturday, October 17 at 10 am at Ticketmaster.com and at the Blue Chip Gift Box in the Blue Chip Casino pavilion. Guests must be 21 or older, with a valid state or government-issued photo ID. 
Blue Chip is also featuring the chance to win a VIP Weekend with Air Supply. The prize includes two front row seats, an overnight hotel stay on November 21 and dinner for two at any Blue Chip venue ($100 value). Enter to win online; contest entries are limited to one per person and one entry per email address; entrants must be 21 years of age or older. 
For more information on entertainment at Blue Chip Casino, Hotel & Spa, visit www.bluechipcasino.com . 
About Blue Chip Casino, Hotel & Spa Blue Chip Casino, Hotel & Spa is the premier entertainment destination in Northwest Indiana. Located an hour’s drive east of Chicago in Michigan City, Indiana, Blue Chip features a 65,000-square-foot single-level casino, two hotel towers with a total of 486 upscale rooms; five restaurants, a spa, full-service salon and fitness center, two gift shops and the 20,000-square-foot Stardust Event Center. For more information, visit www.bluechipcasino.com. Blue Chip Casino, Hotel & Spa is a property of Boyd Gaming. Headquartered in Las Vegas, Boyd Gaming is a leading diversified owner and operator of 22 gaming entertainment properties located in Nevada, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Louisiana, Mississippi and New Jersey. Boyd Gaming and Blue Chip press releases are available at boydgaming.mediaroom.com. Blue Chip Casino, Hotel Spa 777 Blue Chip Drive
